meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snug.
meanings.sent1: The snugness of the blanket kept her warm on the cold night.
meanings.sent2: I love the snugness of my favorite sweater on a chilly day.
meanings.sent3: The snugness of the sleeping bag made it feel like a cozy cocoon.
meanings.sent4: The snugness of the puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly was satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The snugness of the hug from her friend made her feel safe and loved.

meanings.definition: A feeling of comfort or coziness.
meanings.sent1: She felt snugness as she curled up by the fireplace with a book.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a sense of snugness from the soft lighting.
meanings.sent3: The snugness of the fluffy pillows made it hard to get out of bed.
meanings.sent4: The snugness of the old armchair brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The snugness of the hot cocoa warmed her from the inside out.

meanings.definition: The act of fitting closely or tightly.
meanings.sent1: The snugness of the lid on the jar kept the cookies fresh.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the straps for a snugness fit before going on the hike.
meanings.sent3: The snugness of the belt made his pants stay up securely.
meanings.sent4: The snugness of the lock on the door gave her peace of mind.
meanings.sent5: The snugness of the pieces in the jigsaw puzzle made it challenging to separate.
